name: Dr. George W. Davis Senior Center
description: Dr. George W. Davis Senior Center serves as a hub of community services for our seniors and persons with disabilities. It is the go-to place for seniors in the Bayview Hunters Point community to connect with each other and find services featuring: - Nutritious noon meals - Brown Bag Wednesdays - Always Active Exercise Classes - Arts and Crafts - Computer Lab and Classes - Pool and Dominoes - Thursday Night – Whist and Dominoes - Cooking Demonstrations - Monday Night Jazz (seasonal) - Parties and
